messages.content: What is needed to use the comfyui-psd2png node and how can it be installed?
To use the comfyui-psd2png node, the psd_tools library is required. It can be installed using pip with the command: pip install psd_tools.
What does the comfyui-psd2png node do?

The comfyui-psd2png node can recognize PSD files and outputs different elements depending on the selected option: image outputs the entire PSD canvas, top_image outputs the topmost layer's image, even if it's hidden, and mask outputs the topmost layer's mask.
What is the output of the top_image option of the comfyui-psd2png node?
The top_image option of the comfyui-psd2png node outputs the image of the topmost layer in the PSD file, even if the layer is hidden.
What is the output of the mask option of the comfyui-psd2png node?
The mask option of the comfyui-psd2png node outputs the mask of the topmost layer in the PSD file.
